tasks.description: Add authentication functionality to secure the application.

tasks.description: Write unit tests for all components and services.

tasks.description: Develop the registration page for new users.

tasks.description: Optimize the application's performance for faster load times.

tasks.description: Identify and fix bugs reported by users.

tasks.description: Implement error handling for API calls and UI interactions.

tasks.description: Develop the about page with information about the application.

tasks.description: Implement logging to track application events and errors.

tasks.description: Ensure the application is accessible to users with disabilities.
